Review.Titre: The rack shelves I order are great and…
Review.Contenu: The rack shelves I order are great and sturdy looking and arrived quickly. My only complaint was the rack screws that came with it are massive and do not fit in my rack case so I have to go out and buy different ones. Other than that, I’m a repeat customer.

Purchase was easy enough though I had to search their site for rack rails in order to find them. These were needed to secure the rear of the shelf. Delivery was fast. The shelf, however, arrived with a bent right front ear which I easily fixed with a pair of pliars. And the rack rails did not include screws to affix them to my wooden rack unit. Also, if you’re a musician, your rack uses a smaller screw size than those included with either product. Fortunately, I had them.

Assembly: Easy, Everything fit well good instructionsFunction: No removable back panel punch-out I have to cut a hole in the back for power outlet.Everything fit in perfectlyThe hanging System was week for the weight this box is built to hold. I re-enforced it and use lag bolt to the structure.

Review.Titre: Dose not have enough mounting bolts
Review.Contenu: Dose not have enough mounting bolts. The bolts you supplied was only enough for 2and a1/2 boards. The advertisement say up to 8. So where are the bolts? Not a real big deal if you have a part store with the bolts, but there probably not going to be black so get a can of black spray paint to.

Review.Titre: Great products, price, and delivery, but strange design
Review.Contenu: Products arrived in great condition with no issues. Products were affordable and great quality. One of the racks I ordered is meant to be wall-mounted but the mounting points are 18" apart. A typical American house has studs that are 16" or 24" apart, so it's strange that they chose 18". Basically it requires the rack to either be mounted to a backboard, or to the studs at the top.

Review.Titre: My 6U Rack Mounted Drawer arrived with…
Review.Contenu: My 6U Rack Mounted Drawer arrived with the corners of the rack ears bent out a little bit, but nothing I couldn't fix with a wrench and a little gaff tape (to protect the rack ears from the wrench). Bent back to form easily enough and racked up beautifully.

Review.Titre: Slide tracks are a little stiff
Review.Contenu: The size of the shelf was perfect for what we needed. I was able to adjust it to fit my rack, and the tray size was just the size needed to support a USB turntable for my wife’s AV rack in her offic at work.  The only thing keeping it from five stars, is that the slide tracks are very stiff and it takes a lot of effort to slide the tray out.

I am very pleased with the construction of the unit however packaging for shipment was somewhat  lacking for commercial shipping. The box arrived and it showed the rough handling by the carrier. As such one of the rack mount ears was bent away and needed to be bent back into place. Lucky for me it didn’t break off.  That said I am very happy with the product. It should last for years.

Fast delivery, good value.The only thing I'm missing is being able to get a version of the cabinet without the super loud 120V fans - I replaced them with different fans that were about 20dB less noisy, and now I have some fans lying around that I won't need.Would definitely order again!

I bought consumer series wallmount network cabinet 9U for a $70 it is no brainer. Quaility to price is great. Only issue what I have with it was bottom and top pieces was little bend on a sides but nothing to worry about I fixed it with a hand. Next thing is that the door are not parallel to the cabinet it's little offset, but I can live with that.

Assembly instructions could have been clearer. Images were too small to make out the detail to avoid making mistakes with ambiguous orientation of pieces. Someone should observe a novice assembling this enclosure to  improve documentation. I made several errors that were not apparent until late, requiring significant disassembly and some frustration. Once complete, the enclosure is fantastic and is exactly what I wanted it to be.

The server rack was double boxed, which was good.  But when I pulled out the inside box there was one whole side of the inside box that was not taped.  Two of the columns for my server rack landed on asphalt and got scratched and dinged up.  I did receive the order fairly quickly.  And Navepoint contacted to me to address my review and issue.I would do business with them again.

NavePoint 12U 450mm Depth Wallmount Networking Perforated Cabinet (Pro Series): Great cabinet, quick shipping, decent price. Negatives: quick shipping although never received tracking information. No instructions for grounding cabinet. My old cabinet had a built-in ground stud.

I recently purchased a tilt & swivel 2-arm wall mount for a new TV from NavePoint.  I was very pleased with the quality, and everything I needed was in the box.  They even shipped it FedEx at no extra charge. The only reason I didn't give them 5 stars, is that they didn't let me know that they had received my order and that they would be able to ship it the next day.

Review.Titre: I needed expedited shipping for my…
Review.Contenu: I needed expedited shipping for my order and was able to use my own Federal Express account to ship out overnight. I had my doubts as to whether this would actually happen but to my surprise and relief, I received the order next day. The customer service rep I worked with was very pleasant and helpful.  Have you considered changing your shipping policies?

Review.Titre: Very happy with the purchase process
Review.Contenu: Very happy with the purchase process, the rep I spoke with, shipping, and quality of cabinet. The only item that should be better is the first page of the instructions. The written description was not great and the first few illustrations were very poor, so much so that I could not make out which way some of horizontal rails mounted. I recommend creating your own first few steps and illustrations, possibly with actual pictures if not illustrations.

Received incorrect item. Multiple calls to customer service, no answer, transferred to voice mail. Left two voice messages and sent one email. No response. Third day call answered; issue resolved. As far as the item purchase, not yet received, no comment.Upon resolving issue correct Item shipped and received in three days. Item was as described and good quality.

Review.Titre: Great rack drawer but the key doesn't really work.
Review.Contenu: Navepoint has fantastic prices and speedy delivery as well as great customer service. However, the rack drawer I purchased has a very finicky key that works sometimes and I was also under the impression that the holes in the back of the drawer would be there from Navepoint. We had to punch the holes ourselves.

The product is great but the assembly instructions are horrible!! I was 90% built following every written detail when I had to reverse course and completely dissassemble. Not good.*Follow-up: After posting this review I was contacted directly by the Navepoint team to see what they could do to help. I gave them my feedback and they assured me that assembly instructions were something they were already enhancing. Changing my review to 4 stars for the positive customer follow through.

Product and price is great. Assembly instructions could improve a little bit. Minor improvements to door hinge might help with front door aligment. Also, the door closing could be improve by adding a magnet to keep the door closed while is not locked. Overall, I am very satisfied with product and recommend it.

Great product and customer service! Solid rack & sturdy equipment rack. Shelves and drawers were perfect. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because the instructions to build one of the rolling racks wasn't very good. I figured it out, but it just seems like it could have a been a little clearer.

Got the 15U Performance rack. A little damage in shipping, nothing i couldn't fix with a multitool. Putting the rack together was straight forward, instructions sparse but ok. I would have liked a little info on the ground connector in the rack. Im pleased with the rack.

Review.Titre: I bought the Full-Motion Corner Wall …
Review.Contenu: I bought the Full-Motion Corner Wall Mount Bracket and completed installation today. The Mount is GREAT!. The instructions are very poor -  absolutely NO information regarding how high to place the Mount above the floor. I made a drawing with measurements: 1) Desired height of bottom of TV from floor, 2) Height of Bracket Hooks from bottom of TV when Brackets are mounted on TV, 3) Distance from Bracket Hooks Mounting Bar to Wall Mounting Holes, 4) Calculate height from floor for Wall Mounting Holes.

Five stars for service and rapid response to questions. If it was totally based on that 5 stars. The reason for the four star review is the 3c rack mount ears, every screw provided strips the hole. I know this should drop the review lower but they are on point with service

Review.Titre: Shipped fast, price was right, great build quality
Review.Contenu: Shipped fast, price was right, great build quality. Unit dimensions were a bit confusing, smaller than I expected. I wish they provided distance between front and rear rails, as that was what I was expecting the depth measurement to be. Thankfully I was still able to fit everything in it.

Review.Titre: I bought the 4 post 42U and really like…
Review.Contenu: I bought the 4 post 42U and really like it.   It is well built and complete with hardware.  I had no trouble building the rack but there could be more installation guidance about properly sizing the rack depth. The quality and value is excellent. The only item missing is a Keystone patch panel.

I have a smaller flat panel TV mount that works great but the larger articulating one did not work as well since I cannot tilt the TV flat; just faces in a downward tilt. Not bad but could be better... May have just gotten a defective unit but haven't contacted NavePoint. Overall, great price and fast delivery.

it was my first time buying from the web site and things went pretty well. this is my fourth time buying the product and I'm satisfied with it. it's not hard to put together and looks really good on the wall. suggestion: I don't mind paying extra to have it ship already assemble. saves a lot of time

Very well built and competitively priced cabinet. Package was received with some damage to the packaging as well was portions of the cabinet. Nothing so extreme that warranted waiting on a replacement.Shipment was received in a a timely manner. Overall very satisfied with my experience and will order again.

The equipment is professional looking and built well.  The only issues were: 1) provide a slip of paper with some rack install directions would have saved some time, 2) the shipping package was destroyed when it arrived with both ends completely ripped off and missing.  I called NavePoint immediately to give notice that something may be missing or damaged.  No one returned the calls.  Thankfully, nothing was missing and the bent rail repair was minor, 3) of the four shelves, one hole was drilled with the wrong diameter bit.  How that could be was beyond me.  I drilled it myself.

Excellent product with very good quality. This product was easy to install.The only issue I had were the mounting holes in the base were too big. I did not use the large lag bolts and anchors provided.Instead I drilled smaller holes to uss # 8 x 1-3/4 rock to rock screws and mounted to stud behind wall.

Great product, I am very happy. Easy install and sturdy. I just got too few of the M6 cage nuts, I had to improvised using some stuff I found in home depot but I had to order a bag of them to have them handy next time.

Review.Titre: Products are well made for the price …
Review.Contenu: Products are well made for the price you are getting them for. Compared to other websites, these are VERY affordable options from what I've seen. I had a couple shelves come in with rails that popped off, but that's an extremely easy fix, but something to expect(I feel anyways) from this price range. None of my stuff came in damaged or dented, and the shipping was fast. If I have anything else I need to buy for my server rack I'll be keeping this company in mind. Affordable, good quality, and good customer service.

Bought a 9U rack. Overall quality is good, but the bolt holes didn't line up with the pre-installed nuts. I had to drill out two holes to get the rack together. Likely would have worked if I had clamps.

Customer service was terrific. Helped me out to figured which item I needed and did not rush me through at all. Received item in two days and with free shipping. The only negative I have to say is the TV mount I purchased was pretty heavy. It weighed over twice as much as the television itself.

This company has quality parts and displays them with an easy to browse web page.  Navigation is simple and easy. They have  been on time and the materials are as I have ordered.  This seems to be a no hassle company to purchase from. I will continue to buy from them.

Prompt shipping and rack was a great deal for the price. Just wish it was a little more stiff under its own weight when hanging on the wall. I have to lift the front up a bit to get the side covers on since the openings tend to parralellogram a bit.

Review.Titre: Very well built, just mind the attachment packaging
Review.Contenu: Physically, a very, very solid product. My only qualm was they didn't label the different kinds of nuts, bolts, and washers that came in the box. I'm sure I ended up mixing certain nuts that were meant for washer-&-bolt use, with other nuts that were meant to be used only to attach frame elements.I suggest keeping every one of those nut/bolt/washer packages in their wrapping until you have thoroughly read through the assembly instructions (which are very short anyway). This annoyance aside, the rack is an outstanding product!

Review.Titre: Hole configuration in hanger bar does not meet US wall stud spacing standards
Review.Contenu: If the cabinet is to be hung on a wall, the cabinet hanger bar is not configured for US wall standards where wall studs are on 16 inch centers.Since I am building a new house, my builder will install additional wall studs to accommodate the holes in the hanger bar.

Excellent company - exceptional material.  Main concern:  Parts in the equipment enclosures are not identified enough - specifically, such that when order additional or replacement parts, there is a fair amount of guessing to is that the correct screw (size, length, etc), nut, etc.

purchased Cantilever Server ShelfIt is rated to hold 55 pounds, but the 14" shelf is very weak and flimsy.The product was actually bent out of shape when it arrived. So was the 10".NavePoint has offered for me to return them. I'm asking for a better, sturdier shelf.

Review.Titre: Second order -- quality product, competitive pricing...
Review.Contenu: This is the second time I've ordered from NavePoint.   Products are as I expected -- good quality and competitive pricing.   I would like to see NavePoint improve their order tracking: With my first order, I did not check out as a logged in user.   I did not receive a tracking number.   With my second order, I completed my transaction as a logged in user, received my tracking link to USPS, but the link didn't work.   I emailed NavePoint's Customer Service and they sent me another link.   At this point, I'm not sure if the problem lies with NavePoint or USPS.

The item shipped quickly and came packaged nicely. One of the bars was damaged/ dented but not enough that I would complain. Overall I am satisfied with the 15u cabinet and if it wasn't dented it would have received a 5-star rating.

Very sturdy and quality product. Came with a couple of dings. Assembly instructions could have been either more specific or clearer illustration. Overall will buy again cause the end product look and perform great and doesn't take up alot of space.

The rack came very quickly, was easy to assemble and is very sturdy.  My only complaint is that they still use styrofoam packing which is unnecessary and a menace to our environment.  To me, that is a big deal

Great value for the money.  Website very navigatable, easy to order, fast shipping.  Only issue that can be improved upon is the packaging.  Almost half the racks we have ordered in the past have been dented.

Every thing was great. The only issue was  the shipping. The box was damaged on the ends and the rack was bent just a little on the ends. I repaired the ends and it worked out fine. The shipping people should be careful when delivering

Review.Titre: Excellent addition to my home theatre cabinet
Review.Contenu: I use a Navepoint wall-mounted cabinet to contain my home theatre equipment. The sliding shelf was shipped promptly. It supports my newer, bigger AV receiver very well and greatly improves access to the rear connections. The only technical issue: The shelf tends to slide forward because of the inherent springiness of the cables/wires in the rear. This happens even though I have right-angle banana plugs terminating all speaker wiring and have generally organized the wiring pretty well. It would be good to have a magnetic catch to keep the drawer stationary when it's all the way in.

Review.Titre: Need more than one shipping option on website
Review.Contenu: I would give NavePoint a 5 based on overall experience, but only having one "free" delivery option on the website and taking a week to then deliver the equipment was not very helpful. Product is great, price is right, website is easy to use, but...

Review.Titre: Just what we were looking for
Review.Contenu: Purchased a 22U to house AV equipment in a public building. Looks great, appears strong, removable side panels are great . Some sheet metal parts were slightly bent on corners from packing or handling, but they did not look bad or cause any problems. Great price.

I bought the consumer series 9U wall mount cabinet and became somewhat frustrated with the assembly as the instructions and assembly diagrams were not complete (not all parts were identified in the part list).   Also, the unit itself appeared to be designed with very tight tolerances, which caused me lots of problems with the assembly.  NavePoint's customer service was exceptional and very patient with hearing me out and providing the clues I needed to get the job done.   I'd buy from them again (I think) but would hope that they make minor adjustments to the instructions and possibly the design tolerances.

Excellent cabinet. Easy to assemble and install. The documentation could be a bit better in the layout of the vertical rails. And there could be more options on the cable openings...specifically the covers..need more like a broom to slide cables through

Review.Titre: I just started using your products
Review.Contenu: I just started using your products. So far it has been a great experience. Quick turnaround on orders. Sales team could be a little more educated on your products. But overall great thank you for being there for me and my team.

Cabinet is great looking.Very cost effective.Mounting is not as robust as expected.Full size switches tend to make the cabinet sag. Additional internal bracing or possible mounting change to accommodate.Could not find a recommended load wt in specs.

Great products. Sent me screws that didnt fit. One got two different sizes (i guess to choose options), but my second one came with screws that didnt fit at all. Have to go to the store to buy more. Shipping was quick. Would buy from them again!

I am extremely impressed and satisfied with the level of engineering that is evident in the product and very pleased with the value (level of quality for the money).  I would have given it 5 stars had there been triangle braces from the top of the back to the front of the bottom.  We mounted the cabinet on the wall, and the front sags such that I had to push up on the front to snap in the side panel.  I will go to Lowe’s or Home Depot to purchase braces and hardware to fix the problem.  It’s unfortunate your engineering people didn’t figure out that when a box is hung on the wall without angle bracing the front is going to sag.  We have one PC, an APS battery back-up, and a 16-port switch inside—not more than 40 pounds.  If it were sitting on the floor, no problem.

Review.Titre: This survey comes a little too soon…
Review.Contenu: This survey comes a little too soon because my order won't arrive for another day. So my opinion is not valid at this point. Now if the order arrives tomorrow and it is as described without damage, then I will say 5 stars are worthy.

No frills. Just a straight-forward shopping experience. Cabinet was purchased, shipped, and it arrived. Shipping was provided. Nothing extremely exceptional so no 5 stars, but also, no errors, so just perfect.

Nice product.  Took a long time to assemble.  Should note to customers that short shelves that come with the package are not compatible with standard shelving.  I had to order new shelving to match the shelving that I had.

I recently purchased and received my 22U 1000mm 22U Open Frame Rack. The build quality and finish is fantastic, I foresee this rack lasting a very long time. The packaging for the server rack left a lot to be desired however. When I received the package one end of the box was broken open and rails were essentially hanging out of the bottom. I opened it up to find that there was no manual, no casters, no cage nuts, nor any M6 nuts or bolts to assemble it. I called support and they quickly sent out a complete package of hardware at no cost to me and I had it within two days. Overall I'm satisfied with my purchase and would recommend NavePoint to others.

Review.Titre: Most of the equipment purchased seems…
Review.Contenu: Most of the equipment purchased seems solid, however a couple of the plastic racks are not as sturdy as I'd hoped.  Sadly, the cost of shipping for returning some of the products is close to what I'd get on the return.

Review.Titre: Didn’t receive a confirmation email - sent fast tho
Review.Contenu: Didn’t receive a confirmation email, which unnerved me, so I had to email them. However, the speed the item came in was incredible, and by the time they sent me the tracking info, the item was at my house!

Besides the little dents and dings probably from shipping the cabinet it self is great and easy to assemble. Quality is sturdy and the functionality and appearance is spot on. Would definitely recommend to anyone.

The holes on the back of the cabinet are not 16" on center so they cannot be drilled directly into the studs in the wall, other than that the build quality is pretty good on the 6U rack and vented trays.

Like many others, some pieces were damaged in shipping and had to be bent for things to go back together, and the instructions are very poor. Good enough to get it put together and seems like it will serve my purposes well.

Review.Titre: The rack was pretty easy to order and…
Review.Contenu: The rack was pretty easy to order and arrived on time. The rack looks good, I need to install the equipment to find out how is going to handle the weight. A few more screws and cage nuts would've been nice. Thank you.

The rack was as advertised only problem was ther was not enough cage nuts. The quantity of  screws were ok. Thats my reason for only 4 stars. I would definitely order other components from this company.

Review.Titre: The product that was sent was not as …
Review.Contenu: They really turn things around from a bad first experience. After I got the delivery of a product that wasn't what I expected, their customer service team reached out and very politely and very quickly fixed everything.

Review.Titre: Products are greatgreat product minor headache
Review.Contenu: Products are great. The only issue I had was when trying to install the cable management plate I recieved it can with two packages of screws. Not nuts. So I’m waiting for the screws to finish my product.

The product itself is great. The only thing that keeps it from getting five stars was that the screws on the roller track were all loose and one was stripped out. Whomever assembled this unit probably needs more training.

Review.Titre: Great price on cat6..I knew what I was …
Review.Contenu: Great price on cat6..I knew what I was getting but CCA should always have a warning about heat and or outdoor install suggested...The "pull" box leaves room for improvement...BUT again the price CANNOT be beat.

Review.Titre: Thanks for the prompt service and…
Review.Contenu: Thanks for the prompt service and shipment of our order.Sorry for the delay of our survey. We installed the product and wanted to observe the reliability of the product. Thank you again. Wilmot

Review.Titre: Shipping and delivery was excellent but…
Review.Contenu: Shipping and delivery was excellent but some of the instructions to put together the rack were unclear.  The hinge on the door also didn’t fit properly without sliding a small spacer underneath the spring loaded bar so it didn’t hit the top of the cage.  Additionally, the included rack had to be jammed into place and there were no instructions for installation.  Fans are also pretty noisy, but this is to be expected to keep everything cool.  It would be nice to offer an option for quieter fans or to be able to change the fan speed, but as far as convenience, these do the job well.  I’ll probably be swapping out the fans for quieter ones but other than a few nit picky items, the quality of the product is top notch!

Hello,Only problem was the package delivery.  Our case fan was delivered in a US post office envelope; was torn, had been taped up.  May want to look at packaging your shipments with more protection.Thank you

Review.Titre: The door on the rack did not close…
Review.Contenu: The door on the rack did not close correctly. We had to make some adjustments with washers in order for the door to close without hitting the bottom of the rack. Was a bit surprise to encounter this issue.

Really like the cabinet. Although it is bigger than I thought it would be. Happy once it was together but wish the instructions were better. Would love to see a YouTube on the step by step putting it together.

I made an error with my first order and had to send back the rack upon arrival. The customer service team called me and after explaining the issue, they refunded the money and didn't even charge for shipping. NavePoint is going to be my primary source from now on !
Patrick is always great ! Buying something from Navepoint is always a pleasant experience.  Always have what I need, and delivery is always timely.
The shipping was great, product came the next day. Also excellent quality of the product and the price was very reasonable.
The inserts were so easy to install and they add class to the interior.
Easy ordering, blindingly fast delivery and an overall great product when it arrived.

Review.Titre: Very impressed. Satisfied customer, excellent product!
Review.Contenu: I bought a U22 43 inch tall 23 inch deep rack cabinet for some amateur radio equipment. Very impressed with the kindness, professionalism and caring. The customer service agent showed during my order process. The rack purchased is second to none and I’m very impressed with the high-quality construction and thought that went into the cabinet. I would definitely buy other products from this company. Highly recommend products from this company!
Friendly and responsive. Do what they say they will do.

I was not put on hold, Patrick Quinn was very polite, friendly, and professional. He also reminded me if I needed anything else and of course I forgot the little things. That's why I placed another order 5 minutes later. A very pleasant experience.

Review.Titre: I easily got what was needed!  My order was fine.
Review.Contenu: I easily got what was needed!There was a minor issue after my purchase and working with the staff to resolve the problem was a breeze.NavePoint lived up to all their promises.  I got a quality product, when promised, and great customer support before and after the sale.I purchased an enclosed rack with locks for physical security to meet the requirements of our company's security team's standards.I intend to purchase more from NavePoint in the future.

NavePoint has great products at exceptional prices.  The only real issue is the shipping.  They ship the cabinets in the boxes they come in, not shipping boxes and the units are sometimes in pretty rough shape.  I have no other issues with anything else at NavePoint.  The people are great as well.
Item arrived quickly.  Quality of the product was superb..made my install job easy.  Highly recommended vendor.
Tina Fahlsing was very polite and professional. I always prefer to speak to a live person and Navepoint never let's me down. A very pleasant experience.

I needed some audio cable to install in-wall and in-ceiling speakers for my surround system.  NavePoint had exactly what I needed and got it to me very quickly.   Once I got the product I was even happier as it is a great quality cable!   I would buy again from NavePoint.

The Consumer Series 6U cabinet arrived in great shape and very quickly.  Assembly was easy (a very minor bug - the large washer for the front door lock assembly was slightly too large to fit against the frame of the glass panel.  Grinding down one side of the washer fixed the issue).  Tracking information from NavePoint mistakenly linked to USPS rather than FedEx - no big deal.

Review.Titre: Very quick and easy to order.
Navepoint, my online source for racks & cabinets
Review.Contenu: Navepoint has always had a easy to use, web interface with very detailed descriptions of the products. The pricing is on par with industry averages for the quality that you purchase. They haven't steered my wrong yet.

Review.Titre: The networking rack was exactly what I…
Review.Contenu: The networking rack was exactly what I needed to clean up my networking gear.  It was easy to set up.  The unit was a little out of square, having a bit of a problem with the top not laying flat on the rack, but not a real problem.  Otherwise thrilled with the build quality.

Review.Titre: There was a problem with the order
Review.Contenu: There was a problem with the order, but NavePoint was very quick to rectify the problem.  Great customer service.  I will continue to use this company for my low voltage needs.

Review.Titre: Ingenious hinged rack created sanity from chaos!
Review.Contenu: We had an almost inaccessible tangle of cables servicing components for our custom home electronic organ.  They were in a tight space under a counter.  The NavePoint 6U hinged rack fit perfectly and allowed full access to all the components.  It created sanity out of chaos!

I have a unique network cabinet.  It only allows certain size equipment to be placed inside. Because of this, I have been extremely reliant on NavePoint for my shelving. You always have what I need to make my projects work.

I wasn't sure what type of shelf I needed and called at 15 minutes before closing. The customer service person went out of their way to get me the answer I needed from two different departments at the same time. Needless to say, I got exactly what I needed!

They worked through an issue with us that took some time to figure out.  In the end, it was our mistake, but they were patient and extremely helpful through the entire process.  I really appreciated their customer service.

Review.Titre: The rack was exactly what I needed and…
Review.Contenu: The rack was exactly what I needed and arrived on time.  One rail was bent, but that appears to have been caused by shipping as the box was banged up pretty bad when it arrived.  Nothing that pliers couldn't fix.

Review.Titre: Needed a small wall mount rack and…
Review.Contenu: Needed a small wall mount rack and found pleanty of options available.  Website well constructed and informative.  Overall easy experience, then way it should be.  Shipped in a timely manner.

Review.Titre: This is at least the second time I have…
Review.Contenu: This is at least the second time I have had the pleasure of dealing with the same sales representative. She is always fantastic.  Spoke clearly, very patient and polite.
Was purchasing a server rack for home use and had some questions. Very helpful customer service team. Also great response time on the phone - no being hold at all

This was my first order directly through NavePoint. I placed my order on a Wednesday for a variety of items I needed for a job. I expected a week to 10 days for delivery, especially since we were in the holiday delivery season. Instead, everything was on my doorstep in two days. Having everything arrive so quickly I was able to prep some of the work I needed to do prior to going to the job site. Everything I ordered was packaged well and seems to be of quality construction. Fortunately I am familiar with Krone type connectors and had the proper tool for the patch panels. Make sure if you need patch panels to verify the connector type. Krone and 110 are sufficiently different from one another that the proper tool matters.

Review.Titre: I've placed many orders over the years…
Review.Contenu: I've placed many orders over the years and all of them have been shipped quickly and accurately. I especially like to free shipping.

Review.Titre: I have ordered from NavePoint a few…
Review.Contenu: I have ordered from NavePoint a few times. I am always surprised at the speed of delivery. The directions are easy to follow and the quality is unmatched.
I called in for pricing, and Patrick was exceptionally helpful. He explained everything perfectly and had a quote over to me in minutes. Great overall experience and good pricing.
I am very happy with my purchase. Heavy-duty construction and generally simple assembly. Though some parts may be easier with a second pair of hands, everything can be put together by one person.

Review.Titre: Navepoint has always been a great…
Review.Contenu: Navepoint has always been a great source for cabinets and cabling for me for the last 7 years. They have great products with really competitive pricing. They are my goto source for cables, cable management, cabinets, racks, and cable accessories. I started using them when I was not able to find items locally and history was made. Give them a try

Easy to order, great quality. This is my second order and both have been great experiences. The product is nicely finished, including all the tapped holes actually being cleaned out (saves the time I’ve taken in the past running through every hole with a tap). May be slightly more money, but worth every penny.
Super FAST shipping. Got my order like the next day, I couldn't believe it. Also good, real person, customer service when I made a mistake ordering.

I ordered a cabinet and some shelves online but followed up with an email to customer service asking for validation that the shelves would work in the cabinet. I quickly received a call from them informing me that the shelves would not work. Another cabinet was recommended and it came with two shelves. That bundle was less expensive than what I selected. The original order was canceled and I ordered the recommended bundle for a savings of about $50. That’s great service! I look forward to receiving the cabinet in a few days.

Rack and shelves came in a very timely manner. Rack is a solid unit after I finished putting it together. Very well built. The only suggestion I would have is to make it a bit easier to access the nuts for the bolts in order to tighten them. I did struggle a little trying to find the right combination of tools to snug them down. Other than that, I am very pleased with the product.

Review.Titre: Had the cables I wanted at the best price!

Review.Titre: For the first time using Nave Point
Review.Contenu: For the first time using Nave Point, we are very satisfied with everything about the process.  The representative that gave us the quotes was very attentive and accommodating with all the changes we made to it.  The prices for the quality of the products are amazing, and the free shipping is a no brainer.  The only product that we purchased that did not live up to the expectation are the cat6 Keystones.  They are really hard to work with even with cat5 cable.  They are not a bad product, just really tight.  You really have to squeeze the cables into them.  Other than that everything else was amazing.  High quality shielded cable, the wire baskets are more sturdy than any I have ever worked with.  I would for sure recommend them to anyone who needs to have quality products for a pretty unbeatable price.

Review.Titre: NavePoint offers quality products with integrity
Review.Contenu: NavePoint pre sales support was very helpful in answering a list of my questions prior to the purchase. One of those questions was “What happens if the something is damaged during shipment?” I’ll circle back to that topic later.When asked, NavePoint explained the benefits of each cabinet series; they have several to choose from. I selected the NavePoint 15U 600mm Depth Wallmount Networking Cabinet (Professional Series) and 2 NavePoint Fixed Vented Shelves for 600mm Cabinets.Unfortunately, some of my cabinet parts were damaged in shipment. I would have rejected the 86-pound shipment, but the box only appeared to be slightly damaged. NavePoint customer service requested photos of the damaged parts and promptly shipped the replacement parts to me at no cost. It was that simple, yet impressive.The cabinet build instructions were clear and the fit and finish met my expectations, which are higher than most as I work for a global information technology firm. The finished cabinet is a show piece and houses network, surveillance and smart home equipment. My NavePoint experience, start to finish, was great. I would not hesitate to recommend NavePoint to a friend or colleague.This was a personal purchase at full price for home use. I am in no way affiliated with NavePoint.-James
